qa_pairs.question: What is the most important issue that needs to be addressed for people to start a business in San Francisco?
qa_pairs.answer: The city leaders need to ensure the safety of the neighborhood and community because if you don't feel safe even to live in the city, why would you run a business there?
qa_pairs.source_text: I think the city or the city leaders need to make sure that the safe of the neighborhood the community the safety I think thats the number one issue because even right now when I close the restaurant I dont feel good about it knowing that someone might rob me and for small money and yeah I think uh before trying to put everything else I think they need to to take out the safety issue first because if you dont feel safe even to live in the city why would you run a business in the city

qa_pairs.question: Why are people moving out of San Francisco?
qa_pairs.answer: Many people are moving out of San Francisco because of safety concerns.
qa_pairs.source_text: as you see theres a lot of people moving out from San Francisco and those people is not the business minded person its just a regular person and every you got so many people moving out from the city because of the safety reason

qa_pairs.question: What is the issue with building new housing in dense communities in San Francisco?
qa_pairs.answer: If you build new housing in a very dense community and don't provide parking space, it will frustrate people.
qa_pairs.source_text: if you built a new housing in like a very dense community and you dont provide parking space you will make everyone get so angry I mean they they will be frustrated 100 so parking space please do plant parking space

qa_pairs.question: Why do some families prefer to dine outside of San Francisco?
qa_pairs.answer: Some families prefer to dine outside of San Francisco because of the lack of parking spots.
qa_pairs.source_text: I know this family is prefer to go down south to Millbrae to Birmingham to have their meal or lunch or dinner instead of going to the city just because of the parking spot

qa_pairs.question: What challenges do young graduates face in buying a house in San Francisco?
qa_pairs.answer: Young graduates face challenges in buying a house in San Francisco because they are often unaware of how expensive housing is until they realize they need to work many years to afford it.
qa_pairs.source_text: I think that a young person who just graduated from college I think thats they they have no clue or maybe they they have a lot of problems to generate money to buy a house in San Francisco so yeah after they graduate from college they dont know how much how expensive is the housing in San Francisco so when the reality kicks in they know wow I need to work another 35 years straight and then we and yeah and all my income has to be putting in the safe in order for me to afford the house in San Francisco

qa_pairs.question: What does the city or state need to do to help prospective homeowners in San Francisco?
qa_pairs.answer: The city or state needs to provide more programs to help prospective homeowners, as current programs like BMR and down payment assistance are insufficient.
qa_pairs.source_text: the city or maybe the state need to uh to help the uh uh the prospective home owners to have their house first without with a lot of programs I know the city has the BMR like a down payment assistance but unfortunately uh they dont have enough of these programs thats always the problem

qa_pairs.question: What are some positive aspects of living in San Francisco according to Ming Tjong?
qa_pairs.answer: San Francisco has a diverse landscape with hills, ocean, and parks, and the weather is perfect, requiring minimal clothing changes between seasons.
qa_pairs.source_text: San Francisco in general I love the city so much this is like I said at the beginning this is my home now its um that the landscape is not boring so there is a hill ocean and park so yeah everything about San Francisco is really really good and especially the weather in San Francisco its unbelievable I mean you can all you can just have like a two set of clothing and summer and and winter and thats it you dont need to prepare anything else because the weather is just perfect

qa_pairs.question: What concerns does Ming Tjong have about the current state of San Francisco?
qa_pairs.answer: Ming Tjong is concerned about the increase in crime, homelessness, and housing issues in San Francisco over the past few years.
qa_pairs.source_text: I hope the city leaders can do something to make San Francisco better because the last five years I would say right beginning coffee maybe the last four years San Francisco unfortunately San Francisco is going downhill but the crime and with all the the homeless issues the housing issues

qa_pairs.question: Why is it important to address petty crime in San Francisco?
qa_pairs.answer: Addressing petty crime is important because it can lead to more serious crimes if left unchecked.
qa_pairs.source_text: the Pedic line please dont take very crime easily because the the bank robbers and all this big crime is coming from the petty crime because if you let it slide all the time and then its becoming like their practice ground before theyre becoming a real threat a real problem so lets handle all this thing from the beginning if before it gets out of hand
